Articles.Content:
Hello again fellow Kerbanaouts..

I'm back with something new for you to blow up..

Cobalt-Mun Base Mk-3..

[ATTACH=CONFIG]31407[/ATTACH]---[ATTACH=CONFIG]31408[/ATTACH]---[ATTACH=CONFIG]31409[/ATTACH]---[ATTACH=CONFIG]31410[/ATTACH]---[ATTACH=CONFIG]31412[/ATTACH]

-DOWNLOAD: http://www2.zippyshare.com/v/16810820/file.html
-Statistics:

-Mass: 45'800 kg (17'000kg)

-Size: 12 x 12 x 6 m

-Fuel: 500l

-Crew: 3 max

-Engine: FL-T45

Video of me Stress Testing the craft..

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PdnqSMciAYE

Its still W.I.P so if it blows up on its own, you probably pressed the wrong stage button..

Hope you like it.. Edited August 17, 2012 by Atimed
Very creative use of those Mk2 fuselages, I like it

And another great stock piece! Thank you so much! I love space stations and bases, even if it isn't stock I'll be willing to download whatever is needed to make it awesome.

Keep it up man!

-Nolam

Very creative use of those Mk2 fuselages, I like it
And another great stock piece! Thank you so much! I love space stations and bases, even if it isn't stock I'll be willing to download whatever is needed to make it awesome.

Keep it up man!

-Nolam

Glad you like it.. Some improvements will come soon.. I hope to remove the self destruct button..

I seen this, and I though, "Cool space base, only if it was vanilla parts." Then I seen how you used all the parts very creatively. Then I was like

Thanks for the download! I think the next thing you should make is a space station that you can put in orbit. That would be so awesome!

I seen this, and I though, "Cool space base, only if it was vanilla parts." Then I seen how you used all the parts very creatively. Then I was like

Thanks for the download! I think the next thing you should make is a space station that you can put in orbit. That would be so awesome!

I already did, even before this..
